import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import $ from 'jquery'; export default function Card({ picBank, active }) { const [ranImg, setRanImg] = useState({id: "", img: null}) let tempNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 20) async function fetchCard() { fetch("https://pixabay.com/api/?key=35904460-6da0f483724d8177c3f681e67&q=photo") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => {picBank.push(data.hits[tempNum]) setRanImg({id: data.hits[tempNum].id, img: data.hits[tempNum].largeImageURL}) }) } useEffect(() => { fetchCard() }, []) function handleClick(event){ event.target.parentElement.style.transform = "rotateY(0deg)" active.push(event.target.className) } return (<>
handleClick(e)}> this is the back
handleClick(e)}> this is the back
) }
